function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges in scaling up battery value chain","Impact":"Inhibits the transition to sustainable and responsible battery value chain","Mitigation":"Implementing circular value chain, sustainable business and technology practices","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, V2G, digitalization","People":"Battery value chain stakeholders","Owner":"Battery manufacturers, policy makers, technology developers"},{"Description":"Risks of raw material supplies","Impact":"Disruption in battery production processes","Mitigation":"Diversifying raw material sources, implementing circular value chain practices","Technologies":"Digitalization, sustainable business and technology practices","People":"Raw material suppliers, battery manufacturers","Owner":"Raw material suppliers, battery manufacturers"},{"Description":"Increased traffic volume and raw material demand from electric vehicles","Impact":"Social, environmental, and integrity risks across the value chain","Mitigation":"Implementing circular economy practices, improving reuse and recycling, lowering emissions during manufacturing","Technologies":"V2G, digitalization, sustainable business practices","People":"Electric vehicle industry, raw material suppliers","Owner":"Electric vehicle manufacturers, policy makers, circular economy advocates"}]}
